Your Options at Coding Mind

Coding Mind Programs

  • Group Classes

    Enroll in any class with a small group format taught by one of our experienced instructors.

  • 1-on-1 Class

    Get private tutoring by one of our instructors on any class of your choice.

  • Enrichment Project Programs

    Sign up to learn the skills to complete an enrichment project to gain practical experience.

Group Classes

Students come together to learn or practice coding to create software, mobile apps, websites, and other computer programs. The group setting allows for students to learn from each other, collaborate and share their knowledge. Group classes are led by an instructor who are experienced in the specific coding language or technology being taught.

  • Improve social skills
  • Pool knowledge and skills
  • Share diverse perspectives
